if statement.description: Changes which path your code takes

if-else statement.description: Changes which path your code takes

if-else-if statement.description: Changes which path your code takes

for statement.description: Repeat code a given for each entity

date tag.description: a tag that get the value

count tag.description: a tag that get the numbers of a list

capitalize tag.description: uppercases the first letter of any string

uppercase tag.description: a tag that get the uppercase form of given value

lowercase tag.description: a tag that get the lowercase form of given value

contains tag.description: accepts an array and a value as its two parameters, and returns true if the array in parameter one contains the value in parameter two
